original_text: And it came to pass, when Jeroboam the son of Nebat, who was yet in Egypt, heard of it, (for he was fled from the presence of king Solomon, and Jeroboam dwelt in Egypt;)
korean_text: 느밧의 아들 여로보암이 전에 솔로몬 왕의 얼굴을 피하여 애굽으로 도망하여 있었더니 이제 그 소문을 듣고 여전히 애굽에 있는 중에

sentences.original_text: when Jeroboam the son of Nebat
for he was fled from the presence of king Solomon
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 솔로몬 왕의 앞에서 도망했기 때문이라
